FOOTER.COMPANY_DESC: Leading provider of high-quality insulation solutions for residential, commercial, and industrial applications.

HERO.TITLE: Superior Heat Insulation Solutions
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Petra Foam provides high-quality insulation products that help reduce energy costs and create comfortable environments for residential and commercial buildings.

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Our Insulation Products
PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: Discover our range of high-performance insulation solutions designed to meet various thermal and acoustic requirements.

THERMAL_PANELS.TITLE: Thermal Insulation Panels
THERMAL_PANELS.DESCRIPTION: High-density foam panels designed for superior thermal resistance and energy efficiency.

ACOUSTIC.TITLE: Acoustic Insulation
ACOUSTIC.DESCRIPTION: Sound-absorbing solutions for residential and commercial spaces to reduce noise pollution.

SPRAY_FOAM.TITLE: Spray Foam Insulation
SPRAY_FOAM.DESCRIPTION: Versatile spray application for hard-to-reach areas, providing seamless coverage and insulation.

WHY_CHOOSE.TITLE: Why Choose Petra Foam
WHY_CHOOSE.DESCRIPTION: Our commitment to quality and innovation makes us the preferred choice for insulation solutions.

PREMIUM_QUALITY.TITLE: Premium Quality
PREMIUM_QUALITY.DESCRIPTION: All our products meet rigorous quality standards and international certifications.

ECO_FRIENDLY.TITLE: Eco-Friendly
ECO_FRIENDLY.DESCRIPTION: Our insulation solutions are environmentally sustainable and energy-efficient.

EXPERT_SUPPORT.TITLE: Expert Support
EXPERT_SUPPORT.DESCRIPTION: Our team of specialists provides guidance and support throughout your project.

FAST_DELIVERY.TITLE: Fast Delivery
FAST_DELIVERY.DESCRIPTION: We ensure timely delivery and professional installation services.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Our Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Explore some of our recent insulation projects across residential and commercial sectors.

RESIDENTIAL.TITLE: Residential Complex
RESIDENTIAL.DESCRIPTION: Complete thermal insulation for a new residential development.

COMMERCIAL.TITLE: Commercial Office
COMMERCIAL.DESCRIPTION: Acoustic and thermal insulation for a multi-story office building.

INDUSTRIAL.TITLE: Industrial Facility
INDUSTRIAL.DESCRIPTION: High-performance insulation for temperature-controlled industrial spaces.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to Start Your Insulation Project?
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Contact our team of experts today to discuss your insulation needs and get a personalized quote.
